about_the_game:
Grab the Servonauts soundtrack, and transform your daily routine into a journey through space! Thanks to these five tracks you’ll never run out of fuel for your day, whether you’re powering through work, chores, or just vibing in your own orbit.

Grab the soundtrack, blast it on your speaker and keep it on repeat!
Why settle for ordinary when you can live your life like a Servonaut?
detailed_description:
Grab the Servonauts soundtrack, and transform your daily routine into a journey through space! Thanks to these five tracks you’ll never run out of fuel for your day, whether you’re powering through work, chores, or just vibing in your own orbit.

Grab the soundtrack, blast it on your speaker and keep it on repeat!
Why settle for ordinary when you can live your life like a Servonaut?
name: Servonauts Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 350 MB available space

short_description: Get the Servonauts soundtrack and turn your daily routine into a space journey! With five tracks to fuel your day, you’ll be powering through work, chores, or just vibing in your own orbit. Blast it, repeat it—why settle for ordinary when you can live like a Servonaut?
